Key Responsibilities: Write, test, and maintain code; debug issues; collaborate on system design
Required Skills: Programming languages, algorithms, version control, problem-solving
Success Indicators: High code quality, low defect rate, on-time delivery

Key Responsibilities: Define architecture, evaluate technologies, create diagrams, align with business needs
Required Skills: Systems design, cloud platforms, integration patterns, communication
Success Indicators: Scalable and secure solutions, stakeholder alignment

Key Responsibilities: Develop ETL/ELT processes, manage databases, optimize workflows
Required Skills: SQL, Python, data modeling, cloud data platforms
Typical Outputs: Data pipelines, data warehouses, data quality frameworks
Success Indicators: Reliable pipelines, high data availability, optimized performance

Key Responsibilities: Conduct security assessments, implement protections, monitor vulnerabilities
Required Skills: Security frameworks, threat modeling, network security
Typical Outputs: Security policies, monitoring dashboards, incident reports
Success Indicators: Low incident count, strong compliance posture

Key Responsibilities: Gather requirements, prioritize features, coordinate teams, define KPIs
Typical Outputs: Product roadmap, feature specs, KPI reports
Success Indicators: Product adoption, user satisfaction, business impact
